mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS cid, t.id AS tid, c.NAME AS cargoName, c.weight AS weight, c.space AS space, c.base_fee AS baseFee, ( ST_Distance_Sphere ( stwh.point, edwh.point ) / 1000 ) AS distance, co.`name` AS cooperative, ct.`name` AS cargoType, d.`name` AS driver, v.plate_no AS vehicle, stwh.`name` AS startWh, edwh.`name` AS target FROM trans_cargo_record tcr LEFT JOIN trans t ON tcr.tid = t.id LEFT JOIN cargo c ON tcr.cid = c.id LEFT JOIN cargo_type ct ON c.type = ct.id LEFT JOIN `user` d ON t.driver_id = d.id LEFT JOIN vehicle v ON t.vehicle_id = v.id LEFT JOIN warehouse stwh ON t.start_wh_id = stwh.id LEFT JOIN warehouse edwh ON t.end_wh_id = edwh.id LEFT JOIN area_info ai ON c.dest = ai.`code` LEFT JOIN cooperative co ON c.cooperative_id = co.id ORDER BY c.create_time, t.create_time LIMIT #{start}, #{finance.size}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM trans_cargo_record tcr LEFT JOIN trans t ON tcr.tid = t.id LEFT JOIN cargo c ON tcr.cid = c.id LEFT JOIN cargo_type ct ON c.type = ct.id LEFT JOIN `user` d ON t.driver_id = d.id LEFT JOIN vehicle v ON t.vehicle_id = v.id LEFT JOIN warehouse stwh ON t.start_wh_id = stwh.id LEFT JOIN warehouse edwh ON c.local_wh = edwh.id LEFT JOIN area_info ai ON c.dest = ai.`code` LEFT JOIN cooperative co ON c.cooperative_id = co.id

SELECT SUM(c.weight * c.space * c.base_fee * (ST_Distance_Sphere(stwh.point, edwh.point) / 1000)) AS fee FROM trans_cargo_record tcr LEFT JOIN trans t ON tcr.tid = t.id LEFT JOIN cargo c ON tcr.cid = c.id LEFT JOIN warehouse stwh ON t.start_wh_id = stwh.id LEFT JOIN warehouse edwh ON c.local_wh = edwh.id AND t.update_time between DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND NOW()
